# HistoricalComparison

**Enumeration**

An enum that represents a recognized comparison in the statistical analysis of a location’s historical weather data.

## Declaration

```swift
enum HistoricalComparison
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **HistoricalComparison.highTemperature(_:)**: The comparison relates to the location’s maximum temperature averaged since ~1970.
- **HistoricalComparison.lowTemperature(_:)**: The comparison relates to the location’s minimum temperature averaged since ~1970.
- **HistoricalComparison.precipitationAmount(_:)**: The comparison relates to the amount of precipitation at the location averaged over the past 30 days.
- **HistoricalComparison.snowfallAmount(_:)**: The comparison relates to the amount of snowfall at the location averaged over the past 30 days.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
